channel.title: Can a WiFi Router find out my Phone Number?
channel.description: Is it possible for a wifi to find out my phone number or some personal information just by connecting using my phone?

item.title: Can a WiFi Router find out my Phone Number?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
I am not aware of everyone easily able to do that. But I find it very conceivable that mobile phone producers, mobile carriers keep a list MAC addresses that are sold, linked to IMEI / IMSI. And IMEI / IMSI is easily linked to real name.

Why do I think that? Because of the existing issues discovered:

  • https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carrier_IQ#Rootkit_discovery_and_media_attention
  • https://www.gnu.org/proprietary/malware-google.html
  • https://www.gnu.org/proprietary/malware-apple.html

Read full topic
item.source: Can a WiFi Router find out my Phone Number?
